startup and shutdown procedures and maintain control records Monitor network performance in order to determine whether adjustments need to be made and to determine where changes needs to be made in future Analyze equipment performance records to determine the need for repair or replacement Maintain logs related to network functions as well as maintenancerepair records Ensured the Contingency Plan Test was done annually Education Bachelor of Science University of Professional Studies CertificationsLicenses A valid IT Specialist certification
